Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: GenAI can give immediate feedback and don't have to wait for teachers to get back to you. You can ask as many questions for GenAI and get immediate feedback. If questions arise from the answer you able to immediately ask again. GenAI can also give you more precise feedback depending on what you ask

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: GenAI feedback seems neutral whereas teacher feedback seems to directed at me

Question 42.Question: Describe any other differences between the feedback you received from GenAI and your teacher.
Question 42.Response: Feedback for GenAI can sometimes be general and not related to the topic for your assignment for example but teacher feedback is solely based on that assignment/task
